content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20.0, -70.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) connected to a transport belt network
- Transport Belt network connecting furnaces and mining drill

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position (-23.5, -69.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0)
- Transport Belt network facilitating ore movement
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0)
- Transport Belt network facilitating ore movement
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing iron ore

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items between chests

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Transport Belts
- Ensure there is no obstruction at the target location before attempting to place a transport belt. Clear any existing objects that may block placement.

### Errors when Picking Up Entities
- Verify the presence of the entity at the specified position before attempting to pick it up. Ensure the coordinates are correct and the entity exists at that location.

### Errors with Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining drills from halting operations due to lack of space.

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Ensure that all burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate. Regularly refuel mining drills and inserters to maintain continuous operation.
